name: NO SLACKING!
description:
Description:

Delve into an uncompromising experience about the stresses of working without having a single clue on what to do! Experiment and find  out what does and doesnt kill you! Will YOU be able to complete the quota without making a SINGLE MISTAKE?!?!?

Controls:

Use the WASD keys to move, Left click to interact and Q and E to scroll through your inventory. Alternatively, if you have a controller, move with the Left Stick or Dpad, Interact with X or A and scroll through your invetory with the bumpers.

Known Issues:

-If you click in the menu on somewhere else that isnt a button, no button will be selected and you will softlock, so dont click off the game in the menus.

-The selected option will not be highlighted once you change screen in a menu of any kind.

-The game over screen scares people.

I am currently taking 1 week off the project so i will fix these issues once I come back
